places_with_reviews.name: Rainy Resort and Water Park
address: Near Satsang Vihar, Hendra Pada, Kulgaon, Badlapur, Maharashtra 421503, India

reviews.text: I'm very happy and I feel very safe at Rainy resort. Sudhakar is one of the best person I have ever seen.... simple, decent, always give value and respect to customer. Always treat as special person thats feel nice. One best thing is.... food quality is also very nice....but tea is too bad...need to improve the quality of tea.... Mr Alfred is also the cool and Jolly person....clean from the heart... decent... know how to value people...handled the thing very smartly and with proper integrity.... Mr Alfred...God bless you sir.... Sudhakar you are the best....

Positive - cheap rate. Nice small resort with everything u have to enjoy. Don't expect very tall water slides

Negative - no online payment options
जयहिंद. A great place to visit with children. Water Park is exciting and guarded by Life Guards, Food is tasty. Vast playground.Above all, a very co operative staff and The Management !
Multipurpose Resort. Very easy to reach .Big parking place staffs are good co operated. Yesterday 28-1-2024 we had samathuva pongal program by Badlapur tamils  welfare society

I visited the water park rainy resort, it was fun but the water was not clean. I asked the guards multiple times atleast clean the water there are leaves, dirtyness, insects floating but no response. No one at slides also to check whether the person who is currently in slide has left out. Not that as expected but was with family so enjoyed

places_with_reviews.name: NIRVA The Cottage Resort | Resorts In Badlapur | Farmhouse In Badlapur | Best One Day Picnic | Family Friendly Resort Badlapu
address: Nirva, The Cottage Resort, Kondeshwar Road, near Dahiwadi Goan Bridge, East, Badlapur, Maharashtra 421503, India

reviews.text: It was fabulous trip of two days for me as my family wedding! Must visit place for uh all . The rooms are so great and fantastic ambience of the restaurant in side the restore with amazing pools . Should do mostly all functions over there. They have late night dj permission so everyone can enjoy and no issues of travelling as it is 5km from Badlapur Station and have taxis costing around 700 for 8 people one way which is very convenient for the tourists place.

Visited this place for wedding after party of my friend. We got room with extra bed for 4 of us. AC was working well but there no remote to control the temperature. Both lunch and dinner had only veg starters and chicken gravy. For breakfast they served burji pav and misal. The food tasted average. The music were allowed till 12 30 am.

Resort, Location, Food Tase & rooms are absolutely great but service & staff is more worst than pathetic.

While serving the food to wedding guests, all the staff was eating food from same.

Service staff personal hygiene & grooming was worst.

Location is bit away from railway station so Rick guy may charge you anything he want hence by road own vehicle is best option to reach.

Visited there for a wedding. Location was lovely a bit remote so coming by own car or renting a car from Apps is a viable solution, swiming pool was not open and so water was not clean, Rooms were good, for service  they didn't had alcohol at that time, Food taste is great.

Awesome place for small events (max 150 people) like engagements, birthdays, etc. I was here for a friend's engagement. The food was great, service was good, the place was clean and tidy. The price my friend paid for his ceremony also seemed justified.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel S-3 Park
address: Hotel S-3 Park Chikhloli, opp. Empire Industries, Dattanagar, Ambernath, Maharashtra 421505, India

reviews.text: I have ordered orange blossom which says fresh orange, apple juice, mint, etc (cost 200). But they served me Real juice with mint leaves. At least be honest with what you are serving to your customer. Upon that lady manager has the audacity to tell we serve real juice only. They have not mentioned any where that this juice is a canned juice. You deserve a slap. You lost 1 of your customer.

Starters are ok and is good to be recommended... But the main course is such useless as they had kadhi patta in Dal makhani and Garlic based curry in Paneer Pasanda.. who does that.. Will never recommend this to anyone and will never go again to the Restaurant again.. Very unauthentic food even after complaining they have charged to us for the same...... 0 Star rating for food and taste of food....

The rooms are good but ac was not working fine despite of being on lowest temperature, average cooling effect.The basic food item like 2 slice bread butter cost very high it was disappointing and their food service is also pathetic initially the staff confirmed twice the food item is available and later after sometime they denied saying its unavailable which was very annoying. They need to improve their service and train staff to be accurate.

One of the rare classy restaurants in a very unconventional place.
The food variety is just lovely with good taste and excellent portion sizes.
The overall ambience and feel is very upscale both for the downstairs restaurant and the rooftop dining.

It's can sometimes be a bit stuffy in monsoons and have experienced mosquito under the table but the staff sorted it out right away.

That being said my goto lunch dinner spot on my way to and from our second weekend home not to far away from here.

Serving Staff are not doing any great job as they lack coordination and customer service skills and ethics. Also, the location is not excellent due to lack of public transport. However, the only best thing is Hall Rooms for Marriage Functions and the ambience inside.

places_with_reviews.name: Nakshatra Residency
address: Navrang Hospitality Pvt. Ltd., Ambernath Industrial Park, MGN property, Lot No: K - 1, Additional MIDC, Near Anand Nagar, Ambernath (E), Thane Dist, Additional M.I.D.C, Ambernath, Maharashtra 421506, India

reviews.text: I have visited here for dinner...it's a fav place with live music and awesome food... must visit

Can do small functions there.
Cleaning staff needs to pay more attention to the washrooms cleanliness.
The best hotel to stay and dine in this area. Full satisfaction of stay. -- ACP GHORPADE

I found it as a good place. It's a average good hotel for a middle class family. Room rent is less and size is also small. Food is tasty I ate Chinese and Indian from this restaurant it's tasty and there banquet hall is also quite good.
Food quality is good, but the management can definitely work on improving their service.

places_with_reviews.name: Maharaja The Royal Resort
address: Near Jambul M.I.D.C Gate, Ambernath-Badlapur Jambul Phata Road, West, Ambernath, Maharashtra 421505, India

reviews.text:
Maharaja the royal resort is a best choice for destination wedding,we had my son's wedding at Maharaja is was an grand wedding and Maharaja crew made it a memorable royal event.
Amazing decoration
Delicious food
Luxurious ambience in very affordable rates.
Management and staff very cooperative and humble.
We had memorable moments
It's worth to plan your destination for any event .

Visiting this place for the second time for the same Holi event. This resort is situated in a secluded place in Ambarnath and a bit far away from the main city centre. Getting local cabs or auto is a bit difficult here. Rest the place is amazing and they have hosted a very good Holi party in 2023 and 2024 with a minimal price of 799 bucks with lunch, ice gola and chaat counter included. Full access to the swimming pool and also the rain dance. The swimming pool has a separate area for the kids with a proper bund for the safety. The main swimming pool is large. They even host weddings and not just the ordinary ones but in a maharaja style. They have separate cottage areas and a villa. They have an attached bathrooms,  changing room with lockers bang next to the pool area. The premises is big and free to roam. Highly recommended!
Nice and quite place, beautiful rooms.. The food is very delicious... The breakfast was yummy.. Service is good enough.. A decent place to spend your weekends with family and friends!

I was there for Family wedding. The resort location is in Ambernath.the resort is good , amenities are good, but the staff is good.they serve the food but never bother  to check. At wedding night dinner food was pathetic,Rotis,rumali rotis, Dal, Jalebi rabri all was cold .waiters were glaring at us & when manager was called he was not in mood to accept the fault.i will say a Big No to this Resort for marriage purpose.we were so feeled Ashamed in front of our guests.
Very great experience. Best food at this price point unlike other hotel where marriage food is heavy the food is best driving quality of maharaja royal resort.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel D-ADDA
address: Kalyan-Badlapur Road, w, Dist, Belavali, Badlapur, Maharashtra 421503, India

reviews.text:
Had been to the restaurant with friends to have dinner.

Food was good.

They have a well maintained bar section with a variety of alcoholic drinks.

Atmosphere was also good.

Live music facility available. Singer has a good voice.

Well maintained interiors.

Overall management was good.

Ample Parking space available.

Stay at hotel was pleasant. Room was good and well maintained. Staff people were supportive. It has in-house restaurant and bar also. Looked like it is very famous in Badlapur based on fully occupied with guests every day. 😊.. The food quality was good. Looking forward to stay again in future.

Nice arrangements made by D-adda team. The service was awesome by Lakshman and Deep and Aditya, tilak sir. special tnks to Minal madam. So helping in nature n she in personaly involved in all event & managed so well..

Overall good arrangements & staff is very cooperative. Attended ring ceremony function.
Food was 4/5, staff 5/5, Ambience 4/5.
Enough Parking space available.

Excellent location right on the main road. Good well maintained clean rooms. Fine dining restaurant with Karoke on certain nights, good food. The rooms are situated at a higher floor above the restaurant.

places_with_reviews.name: Vrundavan Resorts | Resorts In Badlapur | Farmhouse | One Day Picnic | One Night Stay | Best Hotels | Farm Stay | Nature Stay
address: Near, Bypass Road, Katrap, Badlapur, Maharashtra 421503, India

reviews.text:
Worst experience.

Would not recommend any one to visit here before clearing below points.

Issues faced here are as below:

1.  We a group of 8 friends visited here.
2. It was informed to us will get 1 complimentary room for the day.
3. When we visited the property 1 hall type room was given in which there was no washroom.
4. It was asked to use a common washroom in which people had spit on the toilet seat.
5. We being a group of 8 girls asked for a room with attached washroom.
6. Again we had to speak at reception and all and after an hour a room was given.
7. The room was not clean at all.
8. Not water bottle or anything provided in room.
9. We were later informed that AC charges in room are separate.
10. Per person 100rs only for ac.
11. We asked at reception to negotiate as it was not informed prior that in room there will be no AC.
12. We had planned for a spinster party for 1 of our friend.
13. The lady at the reception was totally rude. She didn't knew how to speak to customers.
14. She is like it's a complimentary room and there will be no AC as we don't have lockers at our place for 1 day picnic we give room. If there is place to keep your bags and for you'll to change then that room is enough for 8 people. This is the response we got.
15. While booking we had clearly mentioned that we are planning for a spinster so will need a room atleast 1.
16. The charges taken by the property was a good amount and the service and experience was totally worst.
17. Will never ever recommend anyone to visit here.

TOTAL WASTE OF OUR HARD EARNED MONEY.

I had an incredible stay at the resort and was blown away by the exceptional hospitality provided.
The staff went above and beyond to ensure my comfort and satisfaction throughout my entire visit.
From the warm welcome at check-in to the personalized service throughout my stay, I was consistently impressed.
The attention to detail and genuine care for guests needs truly set this resort apart, specifically Manager uncle and reception Didi having good caring nature for children.
I highly recommend this resort to anyone looking for a top-notch experience with unmatched hospitality.

Pros -
1. By road it's quite accessible, near foothill however close to city
2. Enough parking space
3. Spacious property, well maintained lawns
4. Space available for Indoor-outdoor games
5. 5ft. and 2ft. Pool, Rain dance
6. Served tasty vegetarian / non vegetarian food
7. Good for friends, okay for families
8. Budget friendly
Need attention -
1. Cleanliness of rooms can be improved
2. Glasses were not available in the room
3. Limited menu but okay
Overall it's not so cozy but okay for one day stay.
I attended a wedding at this place. The place is nice and quiet. But they have not properly maintained it. There were plastic bottle and litter at one corner.
Beautiful serene cool ambient are the few words to describe this place for marriage functions. Ample parking spaces available here.

places_with_reviews.name: HOTEL VANDANA RESIDENCY
address: Katai Pipeline Rd, near HOTEL MAYUR RESTAURANT AND BAR, Navare Nagar, Ambernath, Maharashtra 421501, India

reviews.text: Too good of an experience! Incredibly hospitable staff, great food and great service. Totally recommended to everyone.
Had a great experience this weekend, the staff was very supportive and the rooms were clean and tidy that too at a reasonable price.

We recently had the pleasure of staying at Vandana Residency, Varanasi,  UP, India and were incredibly impressed with the level of hospitality we received. From the moment we walked in, the staff was welcoming and attentive. They went above and beyond to make sure we had a comfortable and enjoyable stay.
Our room was clean and spacious, with all the amenities we needed. The bed was comfortable, and clean. Being close to all important temples, ghats,  and  mouth-watering eateries in Varanasi, it was very convenient for us to visit those places as well
Overall, we had an excellent stay at Vandana Residency. The staff was truly exceptional, and  I would like to give shout-out to Ashok and Aditya who were responsible for looking after guests.
I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a warm and welcoming place to stay in Varanasi.

Worst experience staying at this hotel. Booked at 1500, I checked in late and the hotel asked me extra 1000 rs otherwise they won't let me check in. The service is very very very poor and the staff is very rude. I don't generally post reviews but I hope someone finds it so that they don't have to face what I have gone through staying in such a 3rd class hotel.
Place was clean. A bit noisy at night. Maybe coz my room was just next to the reception. Food was good. All in all very good

places_with_reviews.name: Mullukh Marathha | Mulukh Maratha | Seafood Restaurant in Badlapur | Thali Restaurant
address: Mullukh Marathha, Shop No. 4, 5, 6, Ground Floor Om Mayuresh Apartment, Survey No.26, Hissa No.2, Plot No.5, Katrap Rd, near Monalisa Hotel, East, Badlapur, Maharashtra 421503, India

reviews.text: The food was excellent, the ambience was perfect, and the service was top-notch. I absolutely loved the soft Marathi Sangeet playing in the background. The food was served promptly, and I have to say, the modak dish was a personal favorite. The non-vegetarian food was simply awesome. The place is photogenic, and they maintain it really well. I had a fantastic experience and would highly recommend it.

Really tasty food. Ordered Squid rings, crab lolipop. Amazingly crispy and delicious. For mains we have Prawns Masala with Bhakari and surmai and special mutton thali. Everything we ordered tasted really good. Service is very efficient and good value for the money. Cheers!

Nice ambience.best service indeed .
we had ordered Bombil fry...taste was very nice but very oily. Kala mutton sukha was well cooked and again very tasty. Even fronz was crispy and tasty.
Chicken lapeta and Bheja fry was not upto the mark. We ordered  Bheja fry..it should be dry and spicy...but it was literally Bheja curry..no..no..wasn't good.
Overall good place for foody.

It's as very beautifully decorated restaurant which is decorated in village life theme.
There is indoor as well as outdoor dining arrangement. Indoor seating was little bit noisy.
The food was very very delicious. All the items that we've ordered   there were very testy. The Solkadhi we've tried here was one of the best Solkadhis I've ever tried.
There is a live counter for all types of Bhakris and chapatis on Village-style 'Chulha'.
Ambiance was nice. They need to work on noise control issue.
Service was very nice and quick. All the staff was humble and good in hospitality.
Washroom was clean but very smelly from inside.
Overall experience here of having a lunch was very nice.
Food is Tasty and food quality is good. Very quick response from staff. Fish is fresh. Enjoyed food with silent Marathi songs. One suggestion - Card Payment Option

places_with_reviews.name: Matoshree Resort and River Park
address: Bhai Kotwal Marg, Badlapur, Maharashtra 421503, India

reviews.text: We went for one of the party functions and the resort was kid friendly with good swimming pool and quality of food was also great.

The best  place to visit to have a break from daily routine and have good memorable time with family and friends .

The service here is superb and all the staff is polite .

Talking about the ambiance it's awesome   being around the nature will make you feel relaxed

Very good experience...the owner & all staff are very humble and cooperative...food quality was excellent...also it's on Main road so travelling is also much easier...
For the weekend I suggest it's a very great place to hang out and chill...
Decoration is nice but upon entrance the smell of bird waste is too bad. Food was also not good. Bland vegetable curry, oily puri and the staff is rude to everyone.

mathoshree resort  very good experience.
staff is very humble. food quality and quality is osm
iswar bhau and Ganesh bhai is very good person
I miss my day in resort ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
